DERBY-3589, backported fix from trunk revision 644620 to 10.3.
AllocPage.createPage() doesn't initialize minimumRecordSize correctly Use an object with named fields (PageCreationArgs) instead of an array to pass in arguments when creating a new page. This resolves the problem with StoredPage and AllocPage expecting the same field to be found on different positions in the array.
